content: I think I'll wait until I have more information about the appraiser and the process before deciding whether to get both items appraised at the same time. I'll start researching local appraisers and their credentials to find the best fit for my needs. By the way, speaking of jewelry, I recently organized my jewelry box and found a few pieces that I haven't worn in a while. Do you have any suggestions on how to style a pair of dangling silver hoops with crystals?
